metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32062 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: MapServer before 7.0.8, 7.1.x and 7.2.x before 7.2.3, 7.3.x and 7.4.x before 7.4.5, and 7.5.x and 7.6.x before 7.6.3 does not properly enforce the MS_MAP_NO_PATH and MS_MAP_PATTERN restrictions that are intended to control the locations from which a mapfile may be loaded (with MapServer CGI).

criterions.comment: mapserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
